calculation_method: Pattern-based approach using similar trial data (calculator script not available)
disclaimer: Sample size requires biostatistician review and validation. Calculations are preliminary estimates based on similar GLP-1 RA pivotal trials.
primary_endpoint: Percent change in body weight from baseline to Week 72
co_primary_endpoint: Proportion achieving ≥5% weight reduction at Week 72

continuous_endpoint.basis: STEP 1 (14.9% vs 2.4%), SURMOUNT-1 (15-21% vs 3.1%), ATTAIN-1 (7.5-11.2% vs 2.1%). Conservative estimate used.

alpha_note: One-sided alpha 0.025 (equivalent to two-sided 0.05) to account for co-primary endpoint multiplicity adjustment via hierarchical testing
dropout_basis: STEP 1 reported ~14% discontinuation; SURMOUNT-1 ~15%; conservative 20% assumed for this novel agent

results.note: Adjusted total of 4,500 meets FDA 2025 guidance requirement of ≥3,000 on investigational drug and ≥1,500 on placebo for ≥1 year

software: Pattern-based estimation; formal calculation with nQuery/PASS/SAS PROC POWER required
